about.name: Stockholm
about.info_text: Stockholm, the capital of Sweden, is a picturesque city spread across 14 islands in the Baltic Sea. Known for its stunning archipelago, historic old town, and vibrant cultural scene, Stockholm offers a unique blend of modernity and tradition. Visitors can explore the charming cobblestone streets of Gamla Stan (Old Town), visit world-class museums, and enjoy the city's beautiful parks and waterways. Stockholm is a city of innovation and design, making it a dynamic and inviting destination for travelers from around the world.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 975,000
Country: Sweden
Time Zone: Central European Time (CET, UTC+1)
Language: Swedish, English
Currency: Swedish Krona (SEK)
about.climate_text: Stockholm, the capital of Sweden, has a temperate maritime climate. Summers in Stockholm are relatively mild, with temperatures typically ranging from 15°C to 25°C (59°F to 77°F), while winters are cold, with temperatures between -5°C and 2°C (23°F to 36°F). The city experiences consistent rainfall throughout the year, with snowfall common during the winter months.

attractions_card.title: Gamla Stan (Old Town)
attractions_card.description: Explore the historic Gamla Stan, with its medieval streets, colorful buildings, and iconic Royal Palace.

attractions_card.title: Vasa Museum
attractions_card.description: Visit the Vasa Museum to see the well-preserved warship Vasa, a unique maritime treasure.

attractions_card.title: ABBA The Museum
attractions_card.description: Discover the world of the legendary pop group ABBA at ABBA The Museum.

attractions_card.title: Djurgården Island
attractions_card.description: Explore Djurgården Island, home to many museums, parks, and the Gröna Lund amusement park.

food_card.title: Swedish Meatballs
food_card.description: Try the famous Swedish meatballs, typically served with lingonberry sauce and creamy mashed potatoes.

food_card.title: Herring
food_card.description: Sample herring prepared in various traditional Swedish styles, often served with potatoes and sour cream.

food_card.title: Prinsesstårta
food_card.description: Indulge in Prinsesstårta, a classic Swedish cake with layers of sponge cake, cream, and a green marzipan cover.

hotels_card.title: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
hotels_card.description: Experience luxury at Grand Hôtel Stockholm, a historic and elegant hotel with magnificent waterfront views.

hotels_card.title: Scandic Grand Central
hotels_card.description: Stay at Scandic Grand Central, a stylish and centrally located hotel offering modern comfort.

hotels_card.title: Generator Stockholm
hotels_card.description: Enjoy a trendy and affordable stay at Generator Stockholm, a chic hostel in the city.

transport_card.title: Stockholm Arlanda Airport
transport_card.description: Arrive in Stockholm via Stockholm Arlanda Airport, the city's largest international airport.

transport_card.title: Stockholm Public Transport
transport_card.description: Use Stockholm's efficient public transport system, including trams, buses, and the Stockholm Metro.
